tool_description: Checks if growth measurements fall within normal reference ranges based on age, gender, and selected population standards.

reference_standard.description: Reference standard to use (WHO, CDC, or local)

error_messages: Invalid age: Age must be between 0 and 240 months.
Invalid gender: Gender must be 'male' or 'female'.
Invalid reference standard: Must be 'WHO', 'CDC', or 'local'.
No measurements provided: At least one measurement is required for range checking.
Measurement values out of realistic range: Values are beyond biological possibility.
usage: Provide at least one measurement along with child's age and gender. The tool compares against selected reference standards and indicates normal/abnormal ranges.

height_status.description: Height range status (normal, below_normal, above_normal, or not_assessed)

weight_status.description: Weight range status (normal, below_normal, above_normal, or not_assessed)

head_circumference_status.description: Head circumference status (normal, below_normal, above_normal, or not_assessed)

overall_assessment.description: Overall assessment of measurements within normal ranges

reference_ranges.description: The reference ranges used for comparison
